alert.note: Alert for Northern El Paso County, Monument Ridge, Rampart Range Below 7500 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 06 at 1:17PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern El Paso County through 200 PM MDT... At 116 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Peyton, or 26 miles northeast of Colorado Springs, moving east at 15 mph. A second strong storm is located near Calhan. Both storms will track generally eastward. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Calhan and Ramah. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
